headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Tutor Perini After Its 180% Surge In 2025?
summary: If you are wondering whether Tutor Perini is still a bargain after its huge run, you are not alone. This is exactly the kind of stock where valuation can make or break the decision to buy, hold, or walk away. After years of flying under the radar, the stock has surged, with gains of 179.9% year to date and 782.9% over three years, reshaping both its growth story and perceived risk profile. Much of that momentum has been tied to expectations around its large civil and infrastructure backlog,...
